alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:51PM CDT until July 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COFFEE...SOUTHEASTERN BEDFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN GRUNDY COUNTIES... At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manchester, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Manchester, Tullahoma, Tracy City, Monteagle, Normandy, Hillsboro, Pelham, Raus, Arnold AFB and Fiery Gizzard State Park. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 108 and 134. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
